title: Water movement in soils
creator_credit: J.C. Haish, W.E. Gardner and Washington State University
brief_description: The demonstration, using a model of a vertical section through the soil and time lapse photography, shows how liquid moves through soil of various compositions. The elements of the soil, which control the movement of water and liquid fertiliser, are of major importance in agriculture, irrigation, erosion control etc.
creator_credit_for_label: J.C. Haish, W.E. Gardner and Washington State University
